channel.title: How do i make it so when someone dies Interface (18221) comes up for 10 sec?
channel.description:
My friend has it so when some1 dies an interface comes up on the players screen for 10 seconds
How would i make then come up on the players screen?? when they die for 10 sec and u cant exit outa the interface like
Im walking in the wilderness with all my items i get killed Interface 18221 comes up for 10 seconds. And if they die same with them. So can any1 help me?
Please if u can[br][size=1]Posted on: May 07, 2007, 06:29:37 PM[/size][hr]PLEASE HELP ME
